import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forms', templateUrl: './forms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forms.component.css'] }) export class FormsComponent implements OnInit{ public listComidas: Array<{comida: string, preco: string}> = [ {comida: "salada de frutas", preco: "20"}, {comida: "ovos mexidos", preco: "15"}, {comida: "x-bacon", preco: "9"} ] constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { } }
